reviews.review: Buen juego,con muchos personajes y distintas habilidades.

There are a lot of bugs with this game and it is not enjoyable to play without buddies. A lot of teammates when survivor don't know what they are doing at low levels and when ranking higher (*Starting in purples*) teammates get a sense of what to do but are not a team player. I would recommend this if you are trying to have fun with your buddies but its starting to seem like the development team doesn't care much anymore so I wont recommend this to anyone without buddies or who is competitive

haha i love running around piles of trash ahahaaaaaaa
It's a love and hate situation. Buy it!

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME if you do not want to experience broken mechanics, unbalanced killers and "too bad so sad" customer support. This game will literally ban you for losing connection to their mediocre servers, I have personally got stacked up to a 72hr ban just off losing connection multiple times in a week (it only takes 1 dropped connection). I contacted support and they prove no help, they just say "we are unable to lift bans" which is an obvious lie they just are too lazy to do it. Not only does this game have killers that literally 1 shot you if you pay a certain price, but a whole slew of Pay 2 Win features that overall make the game toxic, frusterating and comepletely unbalanced. They do not care if you have a issue with their game, they are only interested in profiting as its been clearly showcased throughout the years of 5.99 outfits for a fucking video game character
